Hospital.Interfaces

Interface Command

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AppointmentCommand, DiagnosisApproveCommand, DiagnosisCommand, ItemReservationCommand, MedicalTestCommand, NullCommand, TreatmentCommand

    public interface Command
    An interface for the command pattern used in factories.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String execute()
      Executes the command
      boolean isDone()
      Returns whether the command was done.
      java.lang.String undo()
      Undos the execution of the command

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        java.lang.String execute()
                         throws CannotDoException
        Executes the command
        Returns:
        details resulting from the execution
        Throws:
        CannotDoException - When used this exception might arise from executing this command twice without undoing.
        If a command is executed that blocks this one.

      • isDone

        boolean isDone()
        Returns whether the command was done.
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating wether the command was executed

      • undo

        java.lang.String undo()
                      throws NotDoneException,
                             CannotDoException
        Undos the execution of the command
        Returns:
        a string detailing the undoing of the command
        Throws:
        NotDoneException - the action was not undone
        CannotDoException - the command was not yet executed
